title: Instructional Design for Virtual Laboratory-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts, and fundamental computer and internet literacy
context.additional_context: A science education enhancement program for working professionals, applying science experiment simulations to language curriculum domains

learning_goals: Learners can observe and analyze scientific phenomena using computer simulations in an online virtual laboratory.
Learners can independently perform experimental procedures using virtual lab tools provided on a Moodle-based platform.
Learners can orally and in writing present the results of applying scientific principles through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
